title: Replace header logo with official LG Electronics logo image

requirements.summary: Replace the Header component logo with the official LG Electronics logo image asset
acceptanceCriteria: The Header component displays the official LG Electronics logo image (circular red symbol with 'LG' text) instead of the current SVG implementation
Logo maintains appropriate size and spacing within the header layout
Logo is properly aligned with the wrench icon and tagline
Image asset is optimized for web display with appropriate dimensions

file_operations.description: Replace the existing SVG logo implementation with an img element that references the generated LG logo asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/lg-logo.dim_180x60.png. Maintain the existing header layout structure, preserve the wrench icon and tagline positioning, and ensure proper alignment and spacing. The image should use appropriate alt text for accessibility and maintain the LG Heritage Red (#A50034) color scheme in the surrounding header design.
